entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
